cast.overview: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.
cast.title: Paddington

details.biography: Jude Wright was born at the Chelsea & Westminster Hospital in London. He went to the prep school Thomas's Battersea, then he moved to Honeywell in Battersea and then Alleyn's in Dulwich aged 11. He now goes to boarding school KESW in Surrey. Jude Wright won the prize for the best performance for a sitcom for the young actors category, awarded by theskykid.com
details.name: Jude Wright
